definition: to sum up/to conclude/in a nutshell/the end (of a story)

to return/to go back to/to give back to/(of a responsibility) to be taken care of by/to belong to/to gather together/(used between two identical verbs) despite/to marry (of a woman) (old)/division on the abacus with a one-digit divisor
(of a plant) to produce (fruit or seeds)/Taiwan pr. [jie2]
knot/sturdy/bond/to tie/to bind/to check out (of a hotel)

sentences.english: So, that is what it boils.
sentences.chinese: 這件事歸結起來都是錢的問題。

sentences.english: She puts this partly down to simple biology.
sentences.chinese: 她講這個部分歸結於簡單的生物。

sentences.english: That is what gets crunched down to covalent bonding.
This Web site is unavailable due to a planned maintenance outage .
sentences.chinese: 這個網站無法獲得歸結於計劃的維護儲運損耗。

sentences.english: It had attributed mistakes and contradictions to "the fog of war".
sentences.chinese: 這就把錯誤和矛盾歸結於“戰爭迷霧”。

sentences.english: I'd say about 90pc of the questions that came in were variations on 'Am I normal?'
sentences.chinese: 我要說90%的問題都可以歸結爲‘我正常嗎’？

sentences.english: It all comes down to drawing shapes, selecting and shading them properly.
sentences.chinese: 這一切都歸結到繪圖形狀，妥善選擇和底紋。

sentences.english: Sanborn has the longevity attributed their religious beliefs.
sentences.chinese: 桑伯恩曾將長壽原因歸結於自己的宗教信仰。

sentences.english: So, that is what it boils down to.
sentences.chinese: 這件事歸結起來都是錢的問題。

sentences.english: Part of the explanation lies in unfinished business.
sentences.chinese: 這部分要歸結於一些未竟的事業。

sentences.english: These units boil down to number, weight, or volume.
sentences.chinese: 這些單位都歸結爲數字，重量或者體積。

sentences.english: It comes down to tracking conversions.
sentences.chinese: 它最終會歸結爲跟蹤轉換率。

sentences.english: Dr. Fisher theorizes that this is a "female mechanism for mate choice."
sentences.chinese: 費希爾歸結說，這是”女人選擇男人的機制。

sentences.english: The common answer to both of these questions comes down to governance.
sentences.chinese: 這兩個問題的常見答案都可歸結爲治理。

sentences.english: Partly due to the size of the country.
sentences.chinese: 部份原因歸結於這個國家的國土面積。

sentences.english: Well, it's all down to the Earth's orbit around the sun.
sentences.chinese: 好吧，這全都歸結於地球沿着軌道繞太陽公轉。
